name: WebSearch MCP - Ollama Integration (Docker)
description: Docker-based MCP configuration for all Ollama models with tool support

ollama_config.system_prompt: You have access to web search and content extraction tools. Use web_search to find current information and fetch_content to extract detailed content from specific URLs. Always cite sources when using web search results.

tools_guidance.web_search: Use for finding current information, news, research, or general queries. Adjust max_results based on query complexity (3-10 results).
tools_guidance.fetch_content: Use to extract full content from specific URLs found in search results for detailed analysis.
tools_guidance.batch_fetch: Use when you need to extract content from multiple related URLs efficiently.
